trans-unit.source: Provides a means of creating and formatting a valid Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document file, complete with appropriate namespaces, elements, and attributes, for describing an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: Consente di creare e formattare un Web Services Description Language (WSDL) documento file valido, completo di spazi dei nomi appropriati, gli elementi e attributi per descrivere un servizio Web XML.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: Instances of this class can be created with either the `new` keyword or the static <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%2A> method, which parses a WSDL file and assigns its values to appropriate members of the class.
trans-unit.target: È possibile creare istanze di questa classe con il `new` parola chiave o statico <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%2A>(metodo), che analizza un file WSDL e assegna i valori ai membri appropriati della classe.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: WSDL is an XML-based language for describing XML Web services.
trans-unit.target: WSDL è un linguaggio basato su XML per descrivere i servizi Web XML.

trans-unit.source: The ServiceDescription class corresponds to the root element, `definitions`, of a WSDL file.
trans-unit.target: La classe ServiceDescription corrisponde all'elemento radice, `definitions`, di un file WSDL.

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su WSDL, vedere la specifica http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> elements contained in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"> </xref> gli elementi contenuti nel <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection> returned by this property corresponds to the list of `binding` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection>restituita da questa proprietà corrisponde all'elenco di `binding` racchiusi da Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` elemento radice.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su WSDL, vedere la specifica http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: A collection of binding elements contained in the service description.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta di elementi contenuti nella descrizione del servizio di associazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> represents a valid Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file that can be parsed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se un <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>rappresenta un file valido di servizi Web (WSDL, Web Services Description Language) che può essere analizzato.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>
trans-unit.target: Un<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader></xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> can recognize the node on which the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> is positioned; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>in grado di riconoscere il nodo in cui il <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>è posizionato; in caso contrario <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of extensibility elements contained in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di elementi di estendibilità contenuti nel <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The collection of extensibility elements contained in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La raccolta di elementi di estendibilità contenuti nel <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Import"> </xref> gli elementi contenuti nel <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ImportCollection> returned by this property corresponds to the list of `import` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ImportCollection>restituita da questa proprietà corrisponde all'elenco di `import` racchiusi da Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` elemento radice.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ImportCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su WSDL, vedere la specifica http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: A collection of import elements contained in the service description.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di elementi import contenuta nella descrizione del servizio.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Message"></xref> elements contained in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Message"> </xref> gli elementi contenuti nel <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageCollection> returned by this property corresponds to the list of `message` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageCollection>restituita da questa proprietà corrisponde all'elenco di `message` racchiusi da Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` elemento radice.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su WSDL, vedere la specifica http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: A collection of message elements contained in the service description.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di elementi dei messaggi contenuti nella descrizione del servizio.

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace in which the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> class is defined ("http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/").
trans-unit.target: Lo spazio dei nomi XML in cui il <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> classe è definita ("http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/").

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: Questo campo è costante.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.PortType"></xref> elements contained in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.PortType"> </xref> gli elementi contenuti nel <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortTypeCollection> returned by this property corresponds to the list of `portType` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortTypeCollection>restituita da questa proprietà corrisponde all'elenco di `portType` racchiusi da Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` elemento radice.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortTypeCollection>

trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su WSDL, vedere la specifica http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> class by directly loading the XML from a <xref:System.IO.Stream> instance.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza un'istanza di <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> classe caricando direttamente il codice XML da un <xref:System.IO.Stream>istanza.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream>, passed by reference, which contains the bytes to be read.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.IO.Stream>, passato per riferimento, che contiene i byte da leggere.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Il percorso del file da leggere.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the XML Web service to which the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> instance applies.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'URL del servizio Web XML a cui il <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> si applica l'istanza.

trans-unit.source: The URL of the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: L'URL del servizio Web XML.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è una stringa vuota ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets the schema associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo schema associato a questo <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The schema associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lo schema associato a questo <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML serializer used to serialize and deserialize between a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object and a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il serializzatore XML utilizzato per serializzare e deserializzare tra un <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> oggetto e un documento Web Services Description Language (WSDL).

trans-unit.source: The XML serializer can be customized using classes derived from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension> class.
trans-unit.target: Il serializzatore XML può essere personalizzato tramite le classi derivate dalla classe astratta di <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension>classe.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension>

trans-unit.source: These classes are specified in a configuration file using the `serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes` element and its child `add` element.
trans-unit.target: Queste classi vengono specificate in un file di configurazione utilizzando il `serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes` elemento e del relativo figlio `add` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The configuration can be applied to an ASP.NET Web application that publishes a Web service.
trans-unit.target: La configurazione può essere applicata a un'applicazione Web ASP.NET che pubblica un servizio Web.

trans-unit.source: The XML serializer used to serialize and deserialize between a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object and a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
trans-unit.target: Il serializzatore XML utilizzato per serializzare e deserializzare tra un <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> oggetto e un documento Web Services Description Language (WSDL).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection"></xref> instance of which the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> is a member.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection"> </xref> istanza di cui il <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> è un membro.

trans-unit.source: A collection of service description.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di descrizione del servizio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> has not been assigned to a parent collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> non è stato assegnato a una raccolta padre.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Service"></xref> instances contained in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Service"> </xref> contenute in istanze di <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceCollection> returned by this property corresponds to the list of `service` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceCollection>restituita da questa proprietà corrisponde all'elenco di `service` racchiusi da Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` elemento radice.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su WSDL, vedere la specifica http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: A collection of service instances contained in the service description.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di istanze del servizio contenuti nella descrizione del servizio.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML <xref uid="langword_csharp_targetNamespace" name="targetNamespace" href=""></xref> attribute of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_descriptions" name="descriptions" href=""></xref> tag enclosing a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il codice XML <xref uid="langword_csharp_targetNamespace" name="targetNamespace" href=""> </xref> attributo del <xref uid="langword_csharp_descriptions" name="descriptions" href=""> </xref> tag che racchiude un file Web Services Description Language (WSDL).

trans-unit.source: The URL of the XML Web service described by the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'URL del servizio Web XML descritto dal <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Types"></xref> contained by the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Types"> </xref> contenuta la <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Types> instance returned by this property corresponds to the list of `types` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Types>istanza restituita da questa proprietà corrisponde all'elenco di `types` racchiusi da Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` elemento radice.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Types>

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su WSDL, vedere la specifica http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Types"></xref> instance that represents the data types of both the parameters and return values of the methods exposed by the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Types"> </xref> istanza che rappresenta i tipi di dati di entrambi i parametri e valori restituiti dei metodi esposti dal servizio Web XML.

trans-unit.source: Gets a that contains any validation warnings that were generated during a call to <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Boolean%29>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.IO.TextReader%2CSystem.Boolean%29>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>, or <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with the validate parameter set to .
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un che contiene tutti gli avvisi di convalida che sono stati generati durante una chiamata a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Boolean%29>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.IO.TextReader%2CSystem.Boolean%29>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>, o <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.Boolean%29> con il validate parametro impostato su .

trans-unit.source: A that contains any validation warnings that were generated during a call to <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Boolean%29>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.IO.TextReader%2CSystem.Boolean%29>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>, or <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with the validate parameter set to .
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che contiene tutti gli avvisi di convalida che sono stati generati durante una chiamata a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Boolean%29>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.IO.TextReader%2CSystem.Boolean%29>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>, o <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.Boolean%29> con il validate parametro impostato su .

trans-unit.source: Writes out the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> to the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
